summary: A messenger application with dual login system: admin login (username: Negin, password: Negin-Kish) with full edit/delete permissions, and guest login (username selection only) with send-only permissions. All users can send text, image, video, and audio messages. Admins have complete access to edit and delete all messages. Display names shown in chat, profile, and next to messages.
architectural_notes: File storage on Internet Computer for images, videos, and audio messages
Role-based access control: admin (full permissions) vs guest (send-only)
known_issues: No real-time messaging - messages load on page refresh or at intervals

existing_features.title: Create a dual-section login page with two distinct areas: Admin Login and Guest Login

Implement guest authentication flow that redirects to username selection without password requirement
Store user role (admin or guest) in session and frontend state to control UI permissions
Add audio message recording capability with microphone access for all users
Display audio messages with playback controls in message list for all users
Restrict edit and delete functionality for all message types (text, image, video, audio) to admin users only
Update App.tsx to replace simple username check with dual login page as entry point
